meanings.definition: To convene or assemble for a meeting or gathering.
meanings.sent1: We will be conventing at the town hall for the community meeting.
meanings.sent2: The team is conventing in the conference room to discuss the project.
meanings.sent3: The ducks were conventing by the pond, quacking loudly.
meanings.sent4: The stars seem to be conventing in the night sky, forming constellations.
meanings.sent5: Conventing with friends makes the gathering more enjoyable.

meanings.definition: The act of convening or gathering together.
meanings.sent1: The conventing of all the students in the auditorium was impressive.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the conventing of family members during the holidays.
meanings.sent3: The conventing of birds on the tree branches created a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent4: The conventing of clouds in the sky signaled an upcoming storm.
meanings.sent5: The conventing of different cultures at the festival was a sight to behold.
